text: Yeroo Rabbiin "Yaa Iisaa Ilma Maryam! sila situ namootaan anaafi haadha kiyya Rabbii gaditti gabbaramaa lama taasifadhaa jedhee?" jedhu [yaadadhu][Inni] ni jedhe: "Ati qulqulloofte! Ani waan dhugaa naaf hin taane jechuun anaaf hin ta'uYoo ani isa jedheera ta'eef, ati dhugumatti isa barteettaWaan lubbuu kiyya keessaa ni beektaAni waan nafsii kee keessaa hin beekuDhugumatti, ati akkaan beekaa waan fagooti
